extracted_playbook.title: Identify Affected System and Firmware Version
extracted_playbook.description: Check if the system is affected by retrieving the installed firmware version and configurations.

extracted_playbook.condition: Is the system running FW16 to FW22?

extracted_playbook.title: Install Firmware Patch
extracted_playbook.description: Install FW22 Patch 1 or a higher version to mitigate the vulnerability.

cve_id: WAGO PFC100/200 and Touch Panel 600 Vulnerability
affected_products: 762-5xxx, Series WAGO Touch Panel 600 Advanced Line, FW16 <= FW22
762-6xxx, Series WAGO Touch Panel 600 Marine Line, FW16 <= FW22
762-4xxx, Series WAGO Touch Panel 600 Standard Line, FW16 <= FW22
751-9301, WAGO Compact Controller CC100, FW16 <= FW22
